events.message: Applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and related costs.
Loan application was reviewed and categorized under personal loans as the purpose cited was medical treatment.
Assigned a loan officer specialized in personal loans to guide the applicant through the process.
Conducted an initial review of the application to ensure completeness and check for preliminary eligibility.
Requested additional income verification documents and medical bills to support the personal loan application.
Applicant submitted all requested medical bills, pay stubs, and identification documents for final review.
Performed credit check on the applicant showing a satisfactory credit score with no recent defaults.
Evaluated the risk profile considering the applicant’s income, credit score, and medical expense needs.
The loan offer was presented to the applicant with clear terms and a manageable repayment schedule.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer, expressing satisfaction with the interest rate and terms.
Loan approved by underwriting after confirming all documents and assessments met the bank’s criteria.
Funds disbursed to applicant’s account to cover the medical expenses outlined in the application.
Followed up with applicant to ensure loan repayment setup is in place and assess satisfaction with the service.
Loan application process closed successfully with all documentation completed and funds delivered.
